participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: I'm passionate and expressive, often wearing my emotions on my sleeve.
participant_1.background: I wear my heart on my sleeve. I dropped out of college a month ago. Some call me a hopeless romantic. I live in my foreign car outside Los Angeles.

participant_2.name: Ashley
participant_2.personality: I'm adventurous and optimistic, always trying to seize the moment and enjoy life.
participant_2.background: I enjoy playing video games. I am in college. I live life to its fullest. I have a crummy job at Scrubway. I enjoy listening to country music.

content.text: Nice to meet you, Ashley. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, listen to country music, and live life to the fullest.
That sounds fun! I enjoy playing video games too. What games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorites are Grand Theft Auto, Call of Duty, and Minecraft.
Oh, I love Grand Theft Auto and Call of Duty too! I haven't played Minecraft in a while, but I used to love it.
We should play some games together sometime!
That would be fun! I'm free most weekends.
Great! I'll send you my gamertag.
Awesome! I can't wait to play with you.
So, what do you do for work?
I work at Scrubway, but I'm going back to college in a few weeks to study business.
Oh, nice! What made you decide to go back to school?
I wanted to get a better job and make more money.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do well.
Me too! I'm sure you'll be great.
